subject: Beware
event: This motley crew of hedge knights and vagabonds are somewhere on the Mother Road, moving toward Arizona and the Big Hole in Da Ground. Beware, beware, they're armed and dangerous.

comments.article: Woohoo! :D  Watch out for that Hole.  First step's a loo-loo!

I have it, the fear!
=]
comments.subject: Fear!

comments.upictitle: J.A.C.K. Inc.  Super Secret Ninja Force: chiburi
comments.article: Arrrrrr!
Have you notified the authorities?
Nice cutlery :p

That's terribly cute.

Er, I mean...Gah, I'm afraid.

comments.upictitle: Xray Is As Xray Does: smite2
comments.article:
What a pack of scruffy jackanapes and ne'er-do-wells! I hope I never -- and I mean NEVER (you readin' this, KoR and Mizz P?) -- meet those punks in a dark alley.

A darkened bar is another story entirely. ;-)

Glad y'all are having a great time.

comments.article: Jackanapes and ne'er-do-wells? LOL lovin' it babes just lovin' it

comments.article: DUR NO!
hehe!  That's a great pic!  :-)

comments.upictitle: Xray Is As Xray Does: canes
comments.article: Doesn't everybody?
Close the border! Hide the women and liquor! For the love of Dog, don't fill in that big Hole!

Also, (since I can't edit), welcome to Arizona! If you're going to be in the area past Feb 13, swing on out to the SCA event and have a look at a great many grown people dressing in armor and whacking one another with sticks:

http://www.estrellawar.org

If nothing else, it's great fun to watch two huge mobs of people collide while wearing assorted armor. It's like a train wreck on foot!
Hahaha, excellent!

comments.upictitle: J3n the Destruct0r: OH HAI I LIEK ABORTIONS
comments.article: She, in particular, looks like a bloodthirsty barbarian.  I will not fuck with her.
I would fit right in. When's the next plane to Arizona? :)
Ah, the scout party for New Mexico's long-planned invasion of Arizona?

comments.article: That shield is gorgeous.
Hehehe. Looks like they are on their way to Estrella War!
That sword... it's Valyrian steel!!
Last time I visited the Big Hole in Da Ground it was surrounded by tourists from Japan.  I would so love to see their faces if they ran across that group of vagabonds on the rim.

comments.article: They smile politely and then giggle, mind you there was the cutest pair of korian twins that tempted me into a bit of pillaging lol

comments.subject: Yippeeee

comments.article:
Oh, the pillaging! Oh, the ravaging! Ohhhh the ravaging...

They do look like a fun bunch who could drink me under the table. Albeit I'm a lightweight.

Ok, enough with the suspense. Who are they and do they have a how to guide?

By the by, their padded armour and blue chariot looks fearsome indeed.
